::Dragonfly/Other bots::

Dragonfly was reaching at the plce where comlink had come... He saw 
that other bots had been arrived before them and he used his comlink 
to comunitcate with Darkfate.

"COmmander... er.. hum " stmmered the bot he knew how easyly his 
commander got mad "I'm very sorry tell you that.. other bots arrive 
the ship..."

"Then rescue misssion  change to embassy' mission... Use wrong your 
touge and you won't live to regret it, bug" Answered annoyed 
darfate's voice.

Dragonfly said at his followers "go ahead..."

And continued flying toward the ship.


-- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit nods, taking the jetpack and putting it on. He flies off 
> after KitKat.
> 
> "What if they turn out to be hostile?" he asks, catching up to 
KitKat.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > ::KitKat::
> > 
> > She received the message. "I'll be there soon, myself and two 
> others."
> > 
> > She turned to GoldenEye and Drillbit. "You two, follow me. We're 
> > going to get some new back up if possable." She went to the cargo 
> > hold and grabbed two jet packs. She handed one to 
Drillbit. "Here, 
> > put this on and let's go."
> > 
> > She put on her jetpack.
> > GoldenEye transformed into Eagle mode and waited to the command 
to 
> > take off.
> > She opened her com to Destructor. "I'm leaving the pod and taking 
> two 
> > with me to go get that ship. You come here and get the rest of 
the 
> > troops and supplies to the base. Understood?"
> > 
> > She turned to DarkMouse. "DarkMouse, Your in charge untill 
> Destructor 
> > gets here or I return. Got it?"
